reviewText: Bunbury is one of the best. His music is a master piece. This DVD shows you who he is as a musician and parts of his personal life. After buying all of his music, YOU MUST GET THIS DVD.
Very few Latin Alternative artists have toured in the U.S. like Bunbury has.
It is not easy be Bunbury, and turing for the USA jejejje. Very good documental.
If you like his music you'll love this DVD
Excelente documental donde Enrique nos muestra cunto se exige en cada gira cada cada concierto y todas las dificultades que se enfrenta.
Love it! a must for any true fan!

Este DVD estuvo en produccin por casi 5 aos, esto quiere decir que fue prolijamente esculpido y pulido para tener toda la calidad necesaria al reflejar los xitos y atribulaciones de embarcarse, para un espaol, por primera vez en un tour por Estados Unidos por 25 ciudades diferentes. Puede verse claramente los momentos de frustracin cuando Enrique se ve limitado por factores externos, ya sea la incapacidad por ayudar a sus fans en un recinto al cual no los dejaban entrar por no tener una identificacin americana. Otros momentos de gran jubilo al saber que un concierto les fue cojonudo y que todo sali bien, o en otros en donde hasta el aire acondicionado no servia y casi no los dejaban respirar ahi montados en el escenario.
Son momentos como estos, ntimos, personales...que nunca se han visto de Enrique, ahora junto a su compaera inseparable Jose y su gato. Momentos en los que te hacen reflexionar y ver a tu dolo y artista favorito como un ser humano, con sentimientos y no verlo solamente como una maquina rockera del cual exigimos demasiado cuando vamos a verlo a un concierto o tenemos su reciente Cd en nuestras manos.
Tuvo el placer de seguir este tour en Nueva York y en mi ciudad San Francisco. Con mucho placer me vi capturado entre las decenas de cabezas flotantes del publico en el mtico "The Fillmore" en San Francisco.
Es un DVD muy recomendado desde el punto de vista esttico y de produccin, felicitaciones a Alexis y su equipo en finalmente entregarnos una obra como esta. Gracias!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This DVD was in production for nearly 5 years, this means that was neatly carved and polished to have all the necessary quality to reflect the successes and tribulations embarking (for a Spanish singer), for the first time on a US tour on 25 different cities. You can clearly see, moments of frustration when Enrique is limited by external factors, whether the inability to help their fans in a venue which would not let fans get in for not having an US ID. Other moments of great joy, when a concert finished awesome and everything went well, or in others where even the AC units failed, and almost did not let them breathe when they were on stage.
It is moments like these, intimate, personal ... that you have never seen from Enrique, now joined by his inseparable companion Jose and even his cat. Moments that make you think and see your idol and favorite artist as a human being, with feelings and not only see him as a rock and roll machine from whom we demand so much when we go to see him at a concert or have his most recent CD in our hands.
I was thrilled to follow him on this tour on two venues; New York and in my city San Francisco. With pleasure I saw myself captured among the dozens of floating heads on the floor at the legendary "The Fillmore" in San Francisco.
It is a highly recommended DVD from the aesthetic point of view and production, kudos to Alexis and his team. They finally deliver a work with such quality like this.
Thank you!
